mapper.select: SELECT C.ID ,C.MEMBER_ID ,C.PRODUCT_ID ,C.CREATEDAT ,P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,P.PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE ,P.BRAND AS PRODUCT_BRAND ,P.IMAGEURL AS PRODUCT_IMAGEURL FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( ID ,MEMBER_ID ,PRODUCT_ID ,CREATEDAT ) VALUES ( seq_cart.NEXTVAL ,#{member_id} ,#{product_id} ,SYSDATE )
